name: OnTheHunt
description: "On The Hunt" is the brain child of the group Eternal Tale-Tellers created for the class CSC 582 Computer Models of Interactive Narrative, it is an interactive narrative game where the goal of the player is to interact with NPCs and understand what kind of nature they have. The goal of the player is to restore the ancient artifact they have obtained and use the local shopkeepers around to find everything they need.
